title: Support for OpacityMask in WinRT
body: I understand that the OpacityMask was removed for UI performance reasons, but just because it may be over utilized by some doesnt mean it should be dropped all together.

comments.body:
OpacityMasking should be supported by WinRT and Win10 (All platforms)
Of course it shouldn't be applied to big images, but small ones allow a much more refined experience
